title: Boutique NSW Country Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Allow the fresh country air and rural Australian lifestyle to rejuvenate you at Blueberry Hills on Comleroy - an adults-only retreat nestled between the Hawkesbury River and the foothills of the Blue Mountains, in the heart of regional New South Wales. Set on a lush 14-acre plot on historic Comleroy Road, this charming property allows you to fully embrace the serenity of the countryside with relaxing strolls, encounters with resident alpacas and horses, and even blueberry picking, when in season. Located just a 90-minute drive from Sydney, this serene retreat is the perfect launchpad to the magnificent Blue Mountains and lush Wollemi National Park, where a world of adventures amid nature awaits.

title: Boutique Adults-Only Escape in NSW's Blue Mountains with Daily Breakfast
description: Leave the hustle and bustle behind and enjoy a charming countryside stay at the award-winning Blueberry Hills on Comleroy, a boutique retreat nestled in the foothills of NSW's majestic Blue Mountains. Your escape includes delicious daily cooked breakfast, a complimentary bottle of red or white wine to toast your escape and a guaranteed late 11am check out.

title: Boutique Blue Mountains Escape
description:
Leave the hustle and bustle behind and enjoy a charming countryside stay at the award-winning Blueberry Hills on Comleroy, an adults-only retreat (15+) nestled in the foothills of New South Wales' majestic Blue Mountains. 

Set on a lush 14-acre plot on historic Comleroy Road - the oldest settlement in the area, dating back to the late 18th century - this charming property allows you to immerse yourself in the countryside lifestyle, going for relaxing strolls, feeding alpacas and sheep, and embracing the serenity of the Blue Mountains. With the magnificent Wollemi National Park close by, youâ€™ll be spoilt for choice with locations for bushwalking and outdoor activities.

title: Adults-Only Rural Retreat 90 Minutes from Sydney
description:
Allow the fresh country air and rural Australian lifestyle rejuvenate you at Blueberry Hills on Comleroy - an adults-only retreat nestled between the Hawkesbury River and near the foothills of the Blue Mountains, in the heart of regional New South Wales.

Set on a lush 14-acre farm, this charming property that features on Tripadvisor's Travellers' Choice awards for 2021, allows you to fully embrace the serenity of the countryside with relaxing strolls, encounters with resident alpacas and horses, and even blueberry picking, when in season. Located just a 90-minute drive from Sydney, this serene retreat is the perfect launchpad to the magnificent Blue Mountains and lush Wollemi National Park, where a world of adventures amid nature awaits.
